author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
Join J and Ben as they continue rereading the Harry Potter series in this chapter by chapter recap podcast! We hope you enjoy all the Harry Potter goodness that this podcast will bring. Come along as we go Through the Griffin Door.

Chapters: 
00:00:00 - Chapter 10: Luna Lovegood
 1:46:34 - Chapter 11: The Sorting Hat's New Song
 3:41:18 - Chapter 12: Professor Umbridge

Super Carlin Brothers explore Harry Potter theories, Pixar connections, and all your favorite fandoms every week!
